dct_title_s: China Research and Development Activities of Industrial Enterprises, 2013
dct_description_sm: Summary data from China's 2013 economic census, encompassing research and development activities of industrial enterprises, displayed at the province level.
dct_creator_sm: All China Marketing Research Co., Ltd.
